text: Ani sipharasa (ci du'a - prarthana) hi tyacyasamora kahi labha deta nahi, tyancyakherija, jyancyasathi anumanita asavi. Yetheparyanta ki, jevha tyancya hrdayatuna bhaya-dahasata dura keli jate, tevha te vicaratata, tumacya palanakartyane kaya sangitale? Uttara detata ki khare sangitale ani to motha uccatama ani motha mahana ahe
